verses.verse: מַ֝שְׂכִּ֗יל <WH4905> Maschil לְאֵיתָ֥ן <WH387> of Ethan הָֽאֶזְרָחִֽי׃ <WH250> the Ezrahite חַֽסְדֵ֣י <WH2617> of the mercies יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> of the LORD עוֹלָ֣ם <WH5769> for ever אָשִׁ֑ירָה <WH7891> I will sing לְדֹ֥ר <WH1755> to all וָדֹ֓ר ׀ <WH1755> generations אוֹדִ֖יעַ <WH3045> will I make known אֱמוּנָתְךָ֣ <WH530> thy faithfulness בְּפִֽי׃ <WH6310> with my mouth

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for אָמַ֗רְתִּי <WH559> For I have said ע֭וֹלָם <WH5769> for ever חֶ֣סֶד <WH2617> Mercy יִבָּנֶ֑ה <WH1129> shall be built up שָׁמַ֓יִם ׀ <WH8064> in the very heavens תָּכִ֖ן <WH3559> shalt thou establish אֱמוּנָתְךָ֣ <WH530> thy faithfulness בָהֶֽם׃
כָּרַ֣תִּֽי <WH3772> I have made בְ֭רִית <WH1285> a covenant לִבְחִירִ֑י <WH972> with my chosen נִ֝שְׁבַּ֗עְתִּי <WH7650> I have sworn לְדָוִ֥ד <WH1732> unto David עַבְדִּֽי׃ <WH5650> my servant

עַד־ <WH5704> for ע֭וֹלָם <WH5769> ever אָכִ֣ין <WH3559> will I establish זַרְעֶ֑ךָ <WH2233> Thy seed וּבָנִ֨יתִי <WH1129> and build up לְדֹר־ <WH1755> to all וָד֖וֹר <WH1755> generations כִּסְאֲךָ֣ <WH3678> thy throne סֶֽלָה׃ <WH5542> Selah

וְי֘וֹד֤וּ <WH3034> shall praise שָׁמַ֣יִם <WH8064> And the heavens פִּלְאֲךָ֣ <WH6382> thy wonders יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> O LORD אַף־ <WH637> also אֱ֝מֽוּנָתְךָ֗ <WH530> thy faithfulness בִּקְהַ֥ל <WH6951> also in the congregation קְדֹשִֽׁים׃ <WH6918> of the saints

כִּ֤י <WH3588> For מִ֣י <WH4310> who בַ֭שַּׁחַק <WH7834> For who in the heaven יַעֲרֹ֣ךְ <WH6186> can be compared לַיהוָ֑ה <WH3068> the LORD יִדְמֶ֥ה <WH1819> can be likened לַ֝יהוָ֗ה <WH3068> the LORD בִּבְנֵ֥י <WH1121> afflicted אֵלִים׃ <WH410> of the mighty

אֵ֣ל <WH410> God נַ֭עֲרָץ <WH6206> to be feared בְּסוֹד־ <WH5475> in the assembly קְדֹשִׁ֣ים <WH6918> of the saints רַבָּ֑ה <WH7227> is greatly וְ֝נוֹרָ֗א <WH3372> and to be had in reverence עַל־ <WH5921> above כָּל־ <WH3605> all סְבִיבָֽיו׃ <WH5439> of all [them that are] about

יְהוָ֤ה ׀ <WH3068> O LORD אֱלֹ֘הֵ֤י <WH430> God צְבָא֗וֹת <WH6635> of hosts מִֽי־ <WH4310> who כָֽמ֖וֹךָ <WH3644> is like חֲסִ֥ין ׀ <WH2626> who [is] a strong יָ֑הּ <WH3050> LORD וֶ֝אֱמֽוּנָתְךָ֗ <WH530> like unto thee? or to thy faithfulness סְבִיבוֹתֶֽיךָ׃ <WH5439> round about

אַתָּ֣ה <WH859> You מ֭וֹשֵׁל <WH4910> Thou rulest בְּגֵא֣וּת <WH1348> the raging הַיָּ֑ם <WH3220> of the sea בְּשׂ֥וֹא <WH7721> thereof arise גַ֝לָּ֗יו <WH1530> when the waves אַתָּ֥ה <WH859> You תְשַׁבְּחֵֽם׃ <WH7623> thou stillest

אַתָּ֤ה <WH859> Yourself דִכִּ֣אתָ <WH1792> in pieces כֶחָלָ֣ל <WH2491> as one that is slain רָ֑הַב <WH7294> Rahab בִּזְר֥וֹעַ <WH2220> arm עֻ֝זְּךָ֗ <WH5797> with thy strong פִּזַּ֥רְתָּ <WH6340> thou hast scattered אוֹיְבֶֽיךָ׃ <WH341> thine enemies

לְךָ֣ שָׁ֭מַיִם <WH8064> The heavens אַף־ <WH637> also לְךָ֥ אָ֑רֶץ <WH776> [are] thine the earth תֵּבֵ֥ל <WH8398> also [is] thine [as for] the world וּ֝מְלֹאָ֗הּ <WH4393> and the fulness אַתָּ֥ה <WH859> You יְסַדְתָּֽם׃ <WH3245> thereof thou hast founded

צָפ֣וֹן <WH6828> The north וְ֭יָמִין <WH3225> and the south אַתָּ֣ה <WH859> You בְרָאתָ֑ם <WH1254> thou hast created תָּב֥וֹר <WH8396> them Tabor וְ֝חֶרְמ֗וֹן <WH2768> and Hermon בְּשִׁמְךָ֥ <WH8034> in thy name יְרַנֵּֽנוּ׃ <WH7442> shall rejoice

לְךָ֣ זְ֭רוֹעַ <WH2220> arm עִם־ <WH5973> have a גְּבוּרָ֑ה <WH1369> Thou hast a mighty תָּעֹ֥ז <WH5810> strong יָ֝דְךָ֗ <WH3027> is thy hand תָּר֥וּם <WH7311> [and] high יְמִינֶֽךָ׃ <WH3225> is thy right hand

צֶ֣דֶק <WH6664> Justice וּ֭מִשְׁפָּט <WH4941> and judgment מְכ֣וֹן <WH4349> [are] the habitation כִּסְאֶ֑ךָ <WH3678> of thy throne חֶ֥סֶד <WH2617> mercy וֶ֝אֱמֶ֗ת <WH571> and truth יְֽקַדְּמ֥וּ <WH6923> shall go פָנֶֽיךָ׃ <WH6440> before thy face

אַשְׁרֵ֣י <WH835> Blessed הָ֭עָם <WH5971> [is] the people יוֹדְעֵ֣י <WH3045> that know תְרוּעָ֑ה <WH8643> the joyful sound יְ֝הוָ֗ה <WH3068> O LORD בְּֽאוֹר־ <WH216> in the light פָּנֶ֥יךָ <WH6440> of thy countenance יְהַלֵּכֽוּן׃ <WH1980> they shall walk

בְּ֭שִׁמְךָ <WH8034> In thy name יְגִיל֣וּן <WH1523> shall they rejoice כָּל־ <WH3605> all הַיּ֑וֹם <WH3117> all the day וּבְצִדְקָתְךָ֥ <WH6666> and in thy righteousness יָרֽוּמוּ׃ <WH7311> shall they be exalted

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for תִפְאֶ֣רֶת <WH8597> For thou [art] the glory עֻזָּ֣מוֹ <WH5797> of their strength אָ֑תָּה <WH859> and by וּ֝בִרְצֹנְךָ֗ <WH7522> and in thy favour [תָּרִים כ] (תָּר֥וּם <WH7311> bring up ק) קַרְנֵֽנוּ׃ <WH7161> our horn
כִּ֣י <WH3588> for לַֽ֭יהוָה <WH3068> For the LORD מָֽגִנֵּ֑נוּ <WH4043> [is] our defence וְלִקְד֖וֹשׁ <WH6918> and the Holy One יִשְׂרָאֵ֣ל <WH3478> of Israel מַלְכֵּֽנוּ׃ <WH4428> [is] our king

אָ֤ז <WH227> Once דִּבַּ֥רְתָּֽ־ <WH1696> Then thou spakest בְחָ֡זוֹן <WH2377> in vision לַֽחֲסִידֶ֗יךָ <WH2623> to thy holy one וַתֹּ֗אמֶר <WH559> and saidst שִׁוִּ֣יתִי <WH7737> I have laid עֵ֭זֶר <WH5828> help עַל־ <WH5921> unto גִּבּ֑וֹר <WH1368> upon [one that is] mighty הֲרִימ֖וֹתִי <WH7311> I have exalted בָח֣וּר <WH970> young מֵעָֽם׃ <WH5971> out of the people
מָ֭צָאתִי <WH4672> I have found דָּוִ֣ד <WH1732> David עַבְדִּ֑י <WH5650> my servant בְּשֶׁ֖מֶן <WH8081> oil קָדְשִׁ֣י <WH6944> with my holy מְשַׁחְתִּֽיו׃ <WH4886> have I anointed

אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> whom יָ֭דִי <WH3027> With whom my hand תִּכּ֣וֹן <WH3559> shall be established עִמּ֑וֹ <WH5973> with אַף־ <WH637> also זְרוֹעִ֥י <WH2220> mine arm תְאַמְּצֶֽנּוּ׃ <WH553> also shall strengthen

לֹֽא־ <WH3808> Nor יַשִּׁ֣א <WH5378> shall not exact אוֹיֵ֣ב <WH341> The enemy בּ֑וֹ וּבֶן־ <WH1121> upon him nor the son עַ֝וְלָ֗ה <WH5766> of wickedness לֹ֣א <WH3808> Nor יְעַנֶּֽנּוּ׃ <WH6031> afflict
וְכַתּוֹתִ֣י <WH3807> And I will beat down מִפָּנָ֣יו <WH6440> before his face צָרָ֑יו <WH6862> his foes וּמְשַׂנְאָ֥יו <WH8130> them that hate אֶגּֽוֹף׃ <WH5062> and plague

וֶֽאֶֽמוּנָתִ֣י <WH530> But my faithfulness וְחַסְדִּ֣י <WH2617> and my mercy עִמּ֑וֹ <WH5973> and in וּ֝בִשְׁמִ֗י <WH8034> [shall be] with him and in my name תָּר֥וּם <WH7311> be exalted קַרְנֽוֹ׃ <WH7161> shall his horn
וְשַׂמְתִּ֣י <WH7760> I will set בַיָּ֣ם <WH3220> also in the sea יָד֑וֹ <WH3027> his hand וּֽבַנְּהָר֥וֹת <WH5104> in the rivers יְמִינֽוֹ׃ <WH3225> and his right hand

ה֣וּא <WH1931> He יִ֭קְרָאֵנִי <WH7121> He shall cry אָ֣בִי <WH1> unto me Thou [art] my father אָ֑תָּה <WH859> you אֵ֝לִ֗י <WH410> my God וְצ֣וּר <WH6697> and the rock יְשׁוּעָתִֽי׃ <WH3444> of my salvation

אַף־ <WH637> also אָ֭נִי <WH589> I בְּכ֣וֹר <WH1060> him [my] firstborn אֶתְּנֵ֑הוּ <WH5414> Also I will make עֶ֝לְי֗וֹן <WH5945> higher לְמַלְכֵי־ <WH4428> than the kings אָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> of the earth

לְ֭עוֹלָ֗ם <WH5769> for him for evermore [אֶשְׁמֹור־ כ] (אֶשְׁמָר־ <WH8104> will keep ל֣וֹ <WH8104> will I keep ק) חַסְדִּ֑י <WH2617> My mercy וּ֝בְרִיתִ֗י <WH1285> and my covenant נֶאֱמֶ֥נֶת <WH539> shall stand fast לֽוֹ׃
וְשַׂמְתִּ֣י <WH7760> also will I make לָעַ֣ד <WH5703> [to endure] for ever זַרְע֑וֹ <WH2233> His seed וְ֝כִסְא֗וֹ <WH3678> and his throne כִּימֵ֥י <WH3117> as the days שָׁמָֽיִם׃ <WH8064> of heaven
אִם־ <WH518> If יַֽעַזְב֣וּ <WH5800> forsake בָ֭נָיו <WH1121> If his children תּוֹרָתִ֑י <WH8451> my law וּ֝בְמִשְׁפָּטַ֗י <WH4941> not in my judgments לֹ֣א <WH3808> not יֵלֵכֽוּן׃ <WH1980> walk
אִם־ <WH518> If חֻקֹּתַ֥י <WH2708> my statutes יְחַלֵּ֑לוּ <WH2490> If they break וּ֝מִצְוֹתַ֗י <WH4687> not my commandments לֹ֣א <WH3808> not יִשְׁמֹֽרוּ׃ <WH8104> and keep
וּפָקַדְתִּ֣י <WH6485> Then will I visit בְשֵׁ֣בֶט <WH7626> with the rod פִּשְׁעָ֑ם <WH6588> their transgression וּבִנְגָעִ֥ים <WH5061> with stripes עֲוֹנָֽם׃ <WH5771> and their iniquity

וְ֭חַסְדִּי <WH2617> Nevertheless my lovingkindness לֹֽא־ <WH3808> Nor אָפִ֣יר <WH6331> will I not utterly take מֵֽעִמּ֑וֹ <WH5973> with וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> Nor אֲ֝שַׁקֵּ֗ר <WH8266> to fail בֶּאֱמוּנָתִֽי׃ <WH530> from him nor suffer my faithfulness

לֹא־ <WH3808> Nor אֲחַלֵּ֥ל <WH2490> will I not break בְּרִיתִ֑י <WH1285> My covenant וּמוֹצָ֥א <WH4161> the thing that is gone out שְׂ֝פָתַ֗י <WH8193> of my lips לֹ֣א <WH3808> Nor אֲשַׁנֶּֽה׃ <WH8138> nor alter
אַ֭חַת <WH259> Once נִשְׁבַּ֣עְתִּי <WH7650> have I sworn בְקָדְשִׁ֑י <WH6944> by my holiness אִֽם־ <WH518> lo לְדָוִ֥ד <WH1732> unto David אֲכַזֵּֽב׃ <WH3576> that I will not lie
זַ֭רְעוֹ <WH2233> His seed לְעוֹלָ֣ם <WH5769> shall endure for ever יִהְיֶ֑ה <WH1961> shall endure וְכִסְא֖וֹ <WH3678> and his throne כַשֶּׁ֣מֶשׁ <WH8121> as the sun נֶגְדִּֽי׃ <WH5048> before

כְּ֭יָרֵחַ <WH3394> as the moon יִכּ֣וֹן <WH3559> It shall be established עוֹלָ֑ם <WH5769> for ever וְעֵ֥ד <WH5707> witness בַּ֝שַּׁ֗חַק <WH7834> in heaven נֶאֱמָ֥ן <WH539> and [as] a faithful סֶֽלָה׃ <WH5542> Selah

וְאַתָּ֣ה <WH859> You זָ֭נַחְתָּ <WH2186> But thou hast cast off וַתִּמְאָ֑ס <WH3988> and abhorred הִ֝תְעַבַּ֗רְתָּ <WH5674> thou hast been wroth עִם־ <WH5973> against מְשִׁיחֶֽךָ׃ <WH4899> with thine anointed

נֵ֭אַרְתָּה <WH5010> Thou hast made void בְּרִ֣ית <WH1285> the covenant עַבְדֶּ֑ךָ <WH5650> of thy servant חִלַּ֖לְתָּ <WH2490> thou hast profaned לָאָ֣רֶץ <WH776> [by casting it] to the ground נִזְרֽוֹ׃ <WH5145> his crown
פָּרַ֥צְתָּ <WH6555> Thou hast broken down כָל־ <WH3605> all גְּדֵרֹתָ֑יו <WH1448> all his hedges שַׂ֖מְתָּ <WH7760> thou hast brought מִבְצָרָ֣יו <WH4013> his strong holds מְחִתָּה׃ <WH4288> to ruin

שַׁ֭סֻּהוּ <WH8155> spoil כָּל־ <WH3605> All עֹ֣בְרֵי <WH5674> All that pass by דָ֑רֶךְ <WH1870> the way הָיָ֥ה <WH1961> has חֶ֝רְפָּ֗ה <WH2781> him he is a reproach לִשְׁכֵנָֽיו׃ <WH7934> to his neighbours

הֲ֭רִימוֹתָ <WH7311> Thou hast set up יְמִ֣ין <WH3225> the right hand צָרָ֑יו <WH6862> of his adversaries הִ֝שְׂמַ֗חְתָּ <WH8055> to rejoice כָּל־ <WH3605> all אוֹיְבָֽיו׃ <WH341> thou hast made all his enemies

אַף־ <WH637> also תָּ֭שִׁיב <WH7725> Thou hast also turned צ֣וּר <WH6697> the edge חַרְבּ֑וֹ <WH2719> of his sword וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> not הֲ֝קֵימֹת֗וֹ <WH6965> and hast not made him to stand בַּמִּלְחָמָֽה׃ <WH4421> in the battle
הִשְׁבַּ֥תָּ <WH7673> to cease מִטְּהָר֑וֹ <WH2892> Thou hast made his glory וְ֝כִסְא֗וֹ <WH3678> his throne לָאָ֥רֶץ <WH776> to the ground מִגַּֽרְתָּה׃ <WH4048> down

הִ֭קְצַרְתָּ <WH7114> hast thou shortened יְמֵ֣י <WH3117> The days עֲלוּמָ֑יו <WH5934> of his youth הֶֽעֱטִ֨יתָ <WH5844> thou hast covered עָלָ֖יו <WH5921> with בּוּשָׁ֣ה <WH955> him with shame סֶֽלָה׃ <WH5542> Selah

עַד־ <WH5704> long מָ֣ה <WH4100> How יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> Jehovah תִּסָּתֵ֣ר <WH5641> be absent לָנֶ֑צַח <WH5331> alway תִּבְעַ֖ר <WH1197> burn כְּמוֹ־ <WH3644> like אֵ֣שׁ <WH784> burning חֲמָתֶֽךָ׃ <WH2534> anger

זְכָר־ <WH2142> Remember אֲנִ֥י <WH589> I מֶה־ <WH4100> what חָ֑לֶד <WH2465> how short עַל־ <WH5921> is For מַה־ <WH4100> what שָּׁ֝֗וְא <WH7723> vanity בָּרָ֥אתָ <WH1254> my time is wherefore hast thou made כָל־ <WH3605> all בְּנֵי־ <WH1121> the sons אָדָֽם׃ <WH120> of men

מִ֤י <WH4310> What גֶ֣בֶר <WH1397> What man יִֽ֭חְיֶה <WH2421> [is he that] liveth וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> and not יִרְאֶה־ <WH7200> and shall not see מָּ֑וֶת <WH4194> dead יְמַלֵּ֨ט <WH4422> deliver נַפְשׁ֖וֹ <WH5315> his soul מִיַּד־ <WH3027> from the hand שְׁא֣וֹל <WH7585> grave סֶֽלָה׃ <WH5542> Selah

אַיֵּ֤ה ׀ <WH346> Where חֲסָדֶ֖יךָ <WH2617> lovingkindnesses הָרִאשֹׁנִ֥ים ׀ <WH7223> where [are] thy former אֲדֹנָ֑י <WH136> Lord נִשְׁבַּ֥עְתָּ <WH7650> [which] thou swarest לְ֝דָוִ֗ד <WH1732> unto David בֶּאֱמוּנָתֶֽךָ׃ <WH530> faithfulness

זְכֹ֣ר <WH2142> Remember אֲ֭דֹנָי <WH136> Lord חֶרְפַּ֣ת <WH2781> the reproach עֲבָדֶ֑יךָ <WH5650> of thy servants שְׂאֵתִ֥י <WH5375> [how] I do bear בְ֝חֵיקִ֗י <WH2436> in my bosom כָּל־ <WH3605> all רַבִּ֥ים <WH7227> [the reproach of] all the mighty עַמִּֽים׃ <WH5971> people

אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> which חֵרְפ֖וּ <WH2778> have reproached אוֹיְבֶ֥יךָ ׀ <WH341> Wherewith thine enemies יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> O LORD אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which חֵ֝רְפ֗וּ <WH2778> wherewith they have reproached עִקְּב֥וֹת <WH6119> the footsteps מְשִׁיחֶֽךָ׃ <WH4899> of thine anointed
בָּר֖וּךְ <WH1288> Blessed יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> [be] the LORD לְ֝עוֹלָ֗ם <WH5769> for evermore אָ֘מֵ֥ן ׀ <WH543> Amen וְאָמֵֽן׃ <WH543> and Amen
